entry.def: The Arctic is the area of the world around the North Pole. It is extremely cold and there is very little light in winter and very little darkness in summer.
If you describe a place or the weather as arctic, you are emphasizing that it is extremely cold.

example.ex: The bathroom, with its ancient facilities, is positively arctic.
example.tran: 该浴室设备陈旧，肯定非常寒冷。

means.word_mean: 1. a waterproof overshoe that protects shoes from water or snow
1. of or relating to the Arctic;
